Sentencas: In this study, the joint strengths of glass-ceramic sealant placed between two metallic interconnectors (Crofer (R) 22 APU) are experimentally investigated depending on the surface conditions of the metallic interconnector and electrolyte/electrode materials (YSZ and NiO).
Titulo: Effect of surface roughness of the metallic interconnects on the bonding strength in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The surfaces of the interconnectors are sanded with sandpaper having five different grits (60, 120, 240, 320 and 2000 grits).
Titulo: Effect of surface roughness of the metallic interconnects on the bonding strength in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thus, roughened surfaces are obtained and the adhesion is examined for each case.
Titulo: Effect of surface roughness of the metallic interconnects on the bonding strength in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Profilometer is used to inspect the surface roughness of the samples.
Titulo: Effect of surface roughness of the metallic interconnects on the bonding strength in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The fracture strengths of 24 samples prepared for each case are determined via tensile tests.
Titulo: Effect of surface roughness of the metallic interconnects on the bonding strength in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Similarly, different electrolyte/electrode materials with modified surfaces are sandwiched between two glass ceramic layers and their mechanical performances are also measured.
Titulo: Effect of surface roughness of the metallic interconnects on the bonding strength in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results reveal that the joining strength tends to increase with the amount of surface roughness.
Titulo: Effect of surface roughness of the metallic interconnects on the bonding strength in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is also found that NiO adheres better to glass-ceramic material than YSZ.
Titulo: Effect of surface roughness of the metallic interconnects on the bonding strength in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The microstructures of the adhesion interface of some cases are also investigated by a scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Effect of surface roughness of the metallic interconnects on the bonding strength in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The images showed that good adhesion is achieved without any delamination or cracks at the interfaces.
Titulo: Effect of surface roughness of the metallic interconnects on the bonding strength in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Chemical formation between the glass-ceramic sealants, interconnects and SOFC components is further investigated by XRD analyses.
Titulo: Effect of surface roughness of the metallic interconnects on the bonding strength in solid oxide fuel cells
